title: HyperLens Launcher v1 (Zoom toggler App for HyperLens 6.01)
description:
HyperLens Launcher v1 (Zoom toggler App for HyperLens 6.01)


A autoit3 compile script I wrote to launch HyperLens Screen Zoomer
using Ms intellipoint mouse and closes the Hyperlens on a scond
press

To make a cleaner way to launch Zooming, fix the resource leaks
when using enchance Mode and to free up resources when not needing
to zoom screen and close tray icon at the end.

Source code provided.

see HowTo how to install the software and set it up to work with
your Microsoft Mouse 

if you dont have a 4th mouse button you could use the middle roller
button instead.

If you have some other mouse button custom software should work with that
also. since intellipoint only works with MS Mice.


HELP seed if grabbing,.. I cant seed it indefinitely
